app.title: Parallel Model Comparator
app.description: Write a prompt and compare, with multi-gpt, how OpenAI GPT-4o mini, Google Gemini 2.5 Flash, and Claude 4.5 Haiku respond side by side. Enable only the models you want to query.
app.promptPlaceholder: Describe the task you want to compare...

errors.promptRequired: Please type a prompt before sending.
errors.modelRequired: Select at least one model to compare.
errors.unknownModelError: Unknown error while querying the model.

openai.label: OpenAI GPT-4o mini
openai.helper: Balanced answers with solid general reasoning.

claude.label: Anthropic Claude 4.5 Haiku
claude.helper: Excellent for long-form text and structured analysis.

responses.unselected: Model not selected for this query.

footer.disclaimer: For production, use a backend to protect API keys.
